metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9016 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Firejail 0.9.38.4 allows local users to execute arbitrary commands outside of the sandbox via a crafted TIOCSTI ioctl call.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.38-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firejail package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.9.38-1ubuntu0.1').
